name: file-forward-bot
description: Telegram's Best Smart Plugin File Forward Bot

API_ID.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @UseTGXBot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @UseTGXBot

TO_CHANNEL.description: Enter Your channel Id must add Eg:- -100xxxxxxxxx

DESCRIPTION.description: If you want to add a caption to the forwarded file, enter it here

FILE_TYPE.description: Type Of filters {document , audio , photo , video , animation , (empty = forward all kind of messages)}
